vikram.desc: One characteristics of American cooking is the fusion of multiple ethnic or regional approaches into completely new cooking styles.
An Italian meal is famous for its structure into several sections: the appetiser,pasta or rich dish, a meat course and dolce desserts.
Known for its varied flavours and spices, the food of Maxico is result of the Spanish conquistadors interaction with the Aztec culture
In 2014, 14 restaurants in Tokyo and Shonan maintain a Michelin three-stars rating, the ultimate international recognition in the culinary world.
